TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Settings/Global extends Android.Provider.Settings/NameValueTable

Docs.summary: Global system settings, containing preferences that always apply identically to all defined users.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Whether ADB is enabled.
Whether Airplane Mode is on.
A comma separated list of radios that need to be disabled when airplane mode is on.
If 1, the activity manager will aggressively finish activities and processes as soon as they are no longer needed.
Scaling factor for Animator-based animations.
Value to specify if the user prefers the date, time and time zone to be automatically fetched from the network (NITZ). 1=yes, 0=no
Value to specify if the user prefers the time zone to be automatically fetched from the network (NITZ). 1=yes, 0=no
Whether bluetooth is enabled/disabled 0=disabled. 1=enabled.
The content:// style URL for global secure settings items.
Whether or not data roaming is enabled. (0 = false, 1 = true)
Name of an application package to be debugged.
Whether user has enabled development settings.
Whether the device has been provisioned (0 = false, 1 = true)

Docs.summary: Construct the content URI for a particular name/value pair, useful for monitoring changes with a ContentObserver.
Host name and port for global http proxy.

Whether the package installer should allow installation of apps downloaded from sources other than Google Play.
1 = allow installing from other sources 0 = only allow installing from Google Play
Ringer mode.
User preference for which network(s) should be used.

Docs.summary: Store a name/value pair into the database.
Constant for use in AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to specify Bluetooth radio.
Constant for use in AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to specify Cellular radio.
Constant for use in AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to specify NFC radio.
Constant for use in AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to specify Wi-Fi radio.
Control whether the process CPU usage meter should be shown.
Whether we keep the device on while the device is plugged in.
This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

Docs.summary: Scaling factor for activity transition animations.
USB Mass Storage Enabled
If this setting is set (to anything), then all references to Gmail on the device must change to Google Mail.
If 1, when launching DEBUG_APP it will wait for the debugger before starting user code.
The maximum number of times we will retry a connection to an access point for which we have failed in acquiring an IP address from DHCP.
Maximum amount of time in milliseconds to hold a wakelock while waiting for mobile data connectivity to be established after a disconnect from Wi-Fi.
Whether to notify the user of open networks.
Delay (in seconds) before repeating the Wi-Fi networks available notification.
When the number of open networks exceeds this number, the least-recently-used excess networks will be removed.
Whether the Wi-Fi should be on.
The policy for deciding when Wi-Fi should go to sleep (which will in turn switch to using the mobile data as an Internet connection).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy WifiSleepPolicyDefault = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Value for to use the default Wi-Fi sleep policy, which is to sleep shortly after the turning off according to the setting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy WifiSleepPolicyNever = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Value for to never go to sleep.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy WifiSleepPolicyNeverWhilePlugged = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.GlobalWifiSleepPolicy enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Value for to use the default policy when the device is on battery, and never go to sleep when the device is plugged in.
Whether the Wi-Fi watchdog is enabled.
Scaling factor for normal window animations.
